authentication.title: Authentication & Credentials
authentication.description: To access ZentrumHub APIs, you need three key credentials provided when your account is created.

credentials.accountId: Account identifier for your organization. Separate accounts for testing and production environments.
credentials.apiKey: Required to authenticate all API requests. Keep this secure.
credentials.channelId: Point of Sale identifier with specific business configurations (revenue management, content preferences, supplier configuration, relevance rules). Multiple channelIds can be created for different use cases.

environments.production: Live environment with real supplier credentials

autosuggest_overview.title: ZentrumHub Autosuggest API
autosuggest_overview.description: ZentrumHub's Autosuggest enhances user experience by providing intelligent autosuggestions for both location and hotel searches. This API suite includes two key components: Get Suggestions API and Get Location Details API.
components: Get Suggestions API - Dynamically generates relevant suggestions for locations and hotel names as users type
Get Location Details API - Provides detailed information about a selected suggestion, such as coordinates and other pertinent details
benefits: Streamlines the search process and improves accuracy
Reduces time and effort required to find desired data
Facilitates seamless and user-friendly search functionalities

get_suggestions_api.title: Get Suggestions API
get_suggestions_api.description: Returns matching suggestions for user-inputted terms, offering a balanced mix of different location types tailored to specified filters and preferences.

term.description: The search keyword entered by the user

locationTypes.description: Comma-separated list of location types to filter results

usage_examples.description: Search for airports and cities matching 'LON'

get_location_details_api.title: Get Location Details API
get_location_details_api.description: Returns comprehensive details about a location based on the ID selected from the Get Suggestions API. Primarily used for locations of type City, MultiCity, Region, or Neighborhood to obtain their polygonal boundaries.

locationId.description: The location ID obtained from Get Suggestions API

features: Returns polygonal boundaries for precise searches
Can optionally return sub-locations within the given location
Provides geographical information for accurate queries to ZentrumHub's Hotel API
use_cases: Obtaining boundaries for City, MultiCity, Region, or Neighborhood locations
Getting detailed geographical information for targeted searches
Retrieving sub-locations for more granular search options

options.City/MultiCity/Region/Neighborhood: Call Get Location Details API first, then use geocodes in Hotel API

faq.question: What is the ZentrumHub Autosuggest API?
faq.answer: It's an API suite that provides intelligent autosuggestions for location and hotel searches, consisting of Get Suggestions API and Get Location Details API.

faq.question: What location types are supported?
faq.answer: Airport, Country, State, MultiCity, City, Region, PointOfInterest, Neighborhood, Hotel, TrainStation, BusStation, and Area.

faq.question: How do I filter suggestions by location type?
faq.answer: Use the locationTypes query parameter with comma-separated values. Example: ?term=LON&locationTypes=Airport,City

faq.question: When should I use the Get Location Details API?
faq.answer: Use it for City, MultiCity, Region, or Neighborhood locations to get polygonal boundaries and geocodes needed for precise Hotel API searches.

faq.question: What's the base endpoint for the Autosuggest API?
How do I use hotel suggestions?
faq.answer: For Hotel type locations, use the referenceId field as the hotelId in your NEXUS Hotel API request.

faq.question: What about Airport or Point of Interest locations?
faq.answer: For Airport, PointOfInterest, or TrainStation (single geo-coordinate locations), use the circularRegion parameter in ZentrumHub's Hotel API.

cancel_api.title: Cancel API
cancel_api.description: The Cancel API is used for cancelling the reservations using the bookingId made via ZentrumHub booking API.

bookingId.description: The booking ID of the reservation to cancel

partial_cancellation.question: In case of a multi-room booking, can I cancel specific rooms from the booking?
partial_cancellation.answer: No, we do not support partial booking cancellation.
